ygData.subject: Re: Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Can you give more specifics (I assume that you get it from the ogre cities warrior guild and where/what hunter Noble Crest from whom)? If this leads me to
ygData.messageBody:
>You get it from an Ogre Warrior quest. You have to bring a Noble Crest
>from one of the hunters in Innothule to the guildmaster.
>
>-Patrick
Can you give more specifics (I assume that you get it from the ogre cities
warrior guild and where/what hunter Noble Crest from whom)? If this leads me
to get a stein and we're on the same server, will pay you a hefty amount of
PP for your time and help. Tks.
